p: For each of the focal countries, accumulations of susceptible individual precede each peak in reported cases (supplementary Fig. 1c). Apart from Thailand and Taiwan, heightened susceptibility between 2009 and 2014 was apparent. Although total proportion susceptible in Taiwan was consistently low, estimated accumulations of susceptible individuals occur around 1999 and 2006. In Thailand, the estimated proportion susceptible remained stable and relatively low throughout the entire period.
